column4: i have an issue with ffmpeg libav , colors are wrong on xvid mpg and other codecs , as i'm a gentoo user i have no idea on how to reinstall ffmpeg in ubuntu , , 12.04 lts version btw , just try apt-get install ffmpeg ??
